about_the_game:
Prepare to immerse yourself in the fantastical world of Timeless Cafe, where you'll take the reins of a charming restaurant that attracts an extraordinary clientele of cute anime vampires, alluring succubi, majestic dragons and playful catgirls. As the cafe's owner, you'll embark on a dual journey of culinary excellence and heartwarming relationships with your adorable anime staff.

🌟 Features 🌟

🍽️ Culinary Magic Meets Fantasy

Whip up delectable dishes to cater to the unique palates of your extraordinary patrons. Experiment with a fusion of human and supernatural ingredients to create enchanting culinary creations that will leave your guests spellbound.

💖 Forge Unforgettable Bonds

Recruit, nurture, and strengthen relationships with a diverse and charming cast of anime girls who work alongside you in the cafe. Discover their individual stories, dreams, and quirks as you venture into a world of friendship, and perhaps even romance.

🍳 Manage, Enhance, and Expand

Hire and train your staff to perfection, oversee daily operations, and invest in equipment to ensure your cafe.


Timeless Cafe is an extraordinary blend of restaurant management and heartwarming relationships, set against a backdrop of captivating anime charm. Are you ready to forge connections, whip up culinary wonders, and create your own heartwarming story in this enchanting, otherworldly adventure? Join us in Timeless Cafe and be prepared to be charmed by the lovable anime characters and the magical experiences that await!

content_descriptors.notes: The player can meet characters in revealing costumes.

name: Timeless Cafe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,28 Ghz or faste
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 4,20 Ghz or faste
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: 🍰Manage your Cafe, hire adorable anime staff, and build heartwarming relationships in this enchanting restaurant management game! Catgirls, Succubus and Vampires!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
